meanings.definition: The act of making something shorter.
meanings.sent1: The shortening of the book made it easier to carry around.
meanings.sent2: I used a shortening to trim the curtains to fit the window.
meanings.sent3: The shortening of the line at the store caused confusion among the customers.
meanings.sent4: The shortening of the movie plot left out important details.
meanings.sent5: His shortening of the speech made it more concise and impactful.

meanings.definition: A type of fat used in baking to make pastries flaky.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for shortening to make the pie crust flaky.
meanings.sent2: She used shortening instead of butter for the cookie dough.
meanings.sent3: The shortening in the cake batter gave it a rich texture.
meanings.sent4: The shortening melted smoothly into the flour for the pastry dough.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the shortening filled the kitchen as the cookies baked.

meanings.definition: The process of reducing the length of something.
meanings.sent1: The shortening of the rope made it easier to tie knots.
meanings.sent2: He applied shortening to the video to fit it within the time limit.
meanings.sent3: The shortening of the speech turned it into a quick summary.
meanings.sent4: The shortening of the skirt made it more fashionable.
meanings.sent5: The shortening of the meeting agenda saved time for everyone.
